points: Customer base: primarily consists of professionals aged between 30-55 years.
Location: urban areas with high population density and strong professional presence.
Age trend: a gradual increase in the number of customers over the last 5 years, with a significant growth in the age group of 40-45 years.
summary: Our formal clothing brand caters to a demographic of professionals aged between 30-55 years. The customer base is evenly split between males and females. Our business has seen a steady growth over the last 5 years, with a noticeable increase in the number of customers in the age group of 40-45.
